mapper.select: select c.* from system_role a left join system_role_perm b on a.id = b.role_id left join system_perm c on b.perm_id = c.id where a.is_del = 0 and (b.is_del = 0 or b.is_del is null) and (c.is_del = 0 or c.is_del is null) and c.id is not null and parent_chain like CONCAT(#{curParentChain}, '%')

select * from system_role where add_user = #{userId} and is_del = 0
and (id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{filter}), '%') or name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{filter}), '%') )
select * from system_role where is_del = 0 and parent_chain like CONCAT(#{curParentChain}, '%')
